services.title: Machining precision CNC milling and turning
Supplier for materials for the mechanical industry, products for the supporting industry
Provide automation solutions and technical services such as repair, maintenance...

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a leading manufacturing company specializing in precision CNC milling and turning, supplying materials for the mechanical industry and supporting industries.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.item1: Become a prestigious and reliable partner with domestic and international customers and suppliers with the motto of mutual benefits.
mission.item2: Cooperation in development, providing optimal solutions and services for customers and market needs.
mission.item3: Building good human resources for supporting and supporting industries in Vietnam.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.item1: Bringing into play the advantages of outsourcing and domestic suppliers for foreign-invested enterprises in Vietnam.
vision.item2: Contributing to building brands for supporting and auxiliary industries in the international arena.
vision.item3: Constantly learning, creating and developing a variety of processing types and products to meet the needs of domestic and foreign markets.

capabilities.title: Production Capabilities
capabilities.description: Our state-of-the-art machinery and skilled workforce enable us to deliver high-quality precision engineering solutions.

philosophy.title: Business Philosophy
philosophy.item1: Customers as the focus and human resources in the company will bring the company to that focus.
philosophy.item2: Research and develop technology in the process of outsourcing to improve production level.
philosophy.item3: Provide services and optimal solutions for customers instead of just outsourcing and selling products.

values.title: Core Values
values.item2: Supply and serve the needs of customers
values.item4: Bringing the best products to customers
values.item5: Create real value for the industry
values.item6: Always learning and following technology trends

produce.title: Produce
items: Automated machinery according to customer request

business.title: Business
items: Trade in industrial machinery and equipment

service.title: Service
items: Consulting and implementing optimization in production

project.title: Project
items: Processing and manufacturing for Viettel's, Samsung Vietnam

products.title: Our Products
products.description: We produce a wide range of precision-engineered components for various industries.
